text.text_translated:
Today, people do business in many different countries. Most people in business around the world speak English. But how people communicate at work is different in each culture. The rules and what people expect are not the same.

If you do not understand these cultural rules, this can cause problems. You might think bad things about people. These thoughts are not fair. This can cause misunderstandings. People can stop understanding each other.

Business etiquette is the polite rules for work. Here are three important differences in business etiquette around the world. This information can help you. It will help you when you work with someone from a different culture.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Today, people do business in many different countries. Most people in business around the world speak English. But the rules for business communication are very different from culture to culture.

If you do not understand other cultures, this can cause big problems. You might have wrong ideas about people. It can cause misunderstandings and serious problems with communication.

Business etiquette is the name for the polite rules for how to act at work. Here are three important differences in business etiquette around the world. This information can help you. It will help you when you work with someone from a different culture.
